mapper.select:
select j.jno, j.dept, j.arr, j.jdate, j.jtime, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name, m.mtype as member_type from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on m.mno=j.driver_no
where j.dept like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.arr like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.jdate like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.jtime like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by j.jno desc

select j.jno, j.dept, j.arr, j.jdate, j.jtime, j.seat_psgr_cap, j.seat_rear_cap, j.pet, j.fee, j.jcont, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name, m.mtype as member_type from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on m.mno=j.driver_no where j.jno = #{value}
mapper.update: update talat_journey set dept = #{departure}, arr = #{arrival}, jdate = #{journeyDate}, jtime = #{journeyTime}, seat_psgr_cap = #{seatPassenger}, seat_rear_cap = #{seatRear}, pet = #{pet}, jfee = #{fee}, jcont = #{content} where jno = #{jno}
